## Source: ossf-package-analysis (62c589a2be4a74d479fe69b1ace9652ec00a3f0fbc195bdbf1bcdd9927116ff2)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'synapse-contracts' @ 100.99.99 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
